tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_news_articles ( 
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    article_title VARCHAR(255), 
    article_content TEXT, 
    publish_date TIMESTAMP, 
    sentiment_score DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE financial_news_articles (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   title TEXT,
   content TEXT,
   publish_date TIMESTAMP,
   sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis_results (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   article_id INT,
   sentiment_label TEXT,
   confidence_score FLOAT,
   FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES financial_news_articles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE financial_articles (
    article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    publish_date DATE,
    author TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE article_sentiments (
    sentiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id UUID,
    sentiment_type TEXT,
    confidence_level FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES financial_articles(article_id)
);

CREATE TABLE model_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID,
    article_id UUID,
    sentiment_type TEXT,
    model_prediction TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES nlp_models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES financial_articles(article_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Financial_News_Articles (
  article_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
  article_title TEXT,
  article_content TEXT,
  publish_date TIMESTAMP,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
);
